geetest-desc: reCAPTCHA NoCAPTCHA module for Confirm Edit
geetest-edit: To protect the wiki against automated edit spam, we kindly ask you to solve the following CAPTCHA:
geetest-addurl: Your edit includes new external links. To protect the wiki against automated spam, we kindly ask you to solve the following CAPTCHA:
geetest-badlogin: To protect the wiki against automated password cracking, we kindly ask you to solve the following CAPTCHA:
geetest-createaccount: To protect the wiki against automated account creation, we kindly ask you to solve the following CAPTCHA:
geetest-createaccount-fail: It seems you haven't solved the CAPTCHA.
